short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode theme for Mozilla Developer Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A dark theme for Mozilla Developer Network.

This package changes the styling on most pages of MDN, but was written mostly centered around documentation pages. 

We do not track any of your data. This purely changes the styling on MDN, nothing else.
